department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Auxiliary agreement for Acquires auxiliary equipment ELISPOT and Fluorospot for National Microbiology Laboratory Branch (NMLB)
description: The National Microbiology Laboratory Branch (NMLB) has a requirement for delivery and installation of ELISPOT./ Fluorospot Readers. The instrument will support the ongoing immunology studies of COVID-19 and HIV and will allow for enhance capacity to support additional collaborative studies with other NML labs.
